ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AJ4CO Terminated Folded Dipole and Tunable Wideband Receiver system

RevisionEvent.Note: RadioJOVE: Update obsolete radiojove.gsfc.nasa.gov and www.typnet.net URLs, Resource Header Description reformated. Metadata submitted by J.M. Weygand on 2022-02-11, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
Terminated Folded Dipole and Tunable Wideband Receiver system at the AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Observatory, High Springs, Florida.

The TFD array consists of two 4-element (32 foot) square array. Each antenna element is 32 feet long. Bandwidth is 2 MHz. Polarization is simulataneous RCP and LCP. TFD array is aligned to true north. The FSX-8S spectrograph operates at 17-33 MHz simultaneous RCP and LCP.

See the Information URL for a link to a document providing additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: RadioJOVE Spectrograph Users Group
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the RadioJOVE project.

InformationURL.Name: AJ4CO Radio Astronomy Publications
InformationURL.Description: This site provides descriptions of radio receiver systems at AJ4CO as well as other radio astronomy-related documentation

Instrument.InvestigationName: Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX-8S spectrograph at AJ4CO
